short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a video gallery to routes with video links in the comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension moves Mountain Project comments with a video link (currently only Youtube) to a new "Videos" section below the existing "Photos" section. The new section contains the embedded videos from the links.
